column1: '''Helm's Deep (scene)''' is the twenty-sixth scene of ''[[The Lord of the Rings: The Two Towers]]'' and the thirty-fifth scene of [[The Lord of the Rings: The Two Towers (extended edition)
column2: ''The Lord of the Rings: The Two Towers'' (extended edition)]]. This scene was extended in the latter edition.
